text: I’m impressed by the real-time tracking feature, but the mechanic arrived overheated and unprepared.
Please show me the providers available for battery replacement in zip code 30301.
Your in-app chat is glitchy—I can’t send my location to the mechanic.
I scheduled a tow for 7 AM but got a cancellation text at 6:55. Totally unprofessional.
Tow truck is coming from 30 miles away but my car is in pieces on the shoulder!
App suggested an oil change provider when I needed brake repair. Please fix your matching algorithm.
Tow ETA says 45 min but traffic is gridlocked—I can’t wait that long on this busy ramp!
Tow driver went offline mid-route! I’m stranded at exit 22 in Indiana!
Your review system is reliable; the 5-star mechanic lived up to the rating.
Engine just caught fire under the hood in Brooklyn. Dispatch the nearest mechanic urgently—I’m really worried about safety!
Booking maintenance through your platform in Boston was easy and stress-free. Will use again!
The app’s responsiveness on both iOS and Android is excellent.
What providers are available for towing within 10 miles of downtown Portland?
The booking interface loaded quickly, and the service was scheduled as requested.
Car overheated on desert highway—waiting in 110 °F with no water. Urgent help needed!
Why are low-rated shops always the only ones available? My last booking was with a 2-star garage, and it sucked.
I reported a flat tire, but the service offered was a battery replacement.
I changed my booking time effortlessly through the app. Loved the reschedule feature.
Good to know you have 24/7 support for billing issues.
No matches found for transmission work until next week. That’s way too late!
Why does your app say no providers available in my suburb when I know there are garages nearby?
Yes, please show me those.
Does the app provide digital receipts for all completed services?
How do I change my booking date and time after confirmation?
Surge pricing slapped a $40 fee on my battery change at 10 AM. That’s ridiculous.
The simple onboarding tutorial helped me understand all features quickly.
Is there live phone support if I need help with my booking?
Hit a deer on remote highway. Radiator leaking—need emergency tow or I’ll overheat!
Okay, I see.
Vehicle fire in engine bay, flames rising! Please send emergency tow NOW!
